newsitem.title: MOROCCO: Moroccan tourism receipts up 28 pct in 5 months.
newsitem.headline: Moroccan tourism receipts up 28 pct in 5 months.

text.p: Morocco's tourism receipts rose to 4.305 billion dirhams ($500 million) in the first five months of 1996 from 3.370 billion dirhams ($391 million) in the same period last year, the trade regulatory body Office des Changes said in its bulletin.

Tourism is the second biggest foreign currency earner after expatriate remittances which the bulletin said were estimated at 6.954 billion dirhams ($808 million) in the first five months of 1996. Remittances in that period were up by 3.2 percent over the 6.736 billion dirhams for the same time in 1995. ($=8.6 dirhams)
